title: P22 Sale-oween
content:
“Say it with fonts” - P22’s Pre-holiday gift giving sale!

For the first time, we are offering 50% off on select,  
packaged, P22 artist-themed fonts (see details below).  
Give a unique gift this season with a packaged CD font  
set. These packaged font sets have long been the way that  
many people have been introduced to the world of P22 and  
they make great gifts. For two weeks only, you can get the  
following four P22 CD titles for 50% off or $14.98 each:

Vincent - http://www.p22.com/products/vincent.html  
Vienna - http://www.p22.com/products/vienna.html  
Art Deco - http://www.p22.com/products/artdeco.html  
Koch Signs - [http://www.p22.com/products/kochsigns.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20060129052314/http:/www.p22.com/products/kochsigns.html)

— This offer is valid through October 31st.  
— Does not apply to downloads.  
— Shipping is not included  
— No limit to the number ordered, but quantities are  
limited.

To order the boxed sets, you can place an order on-line or  
call 1 800 722 5080.

BUT if you are not ready for the Winter holidays yet, and  
still need to make Halloween party invitations… you are  
in luck!

INTRODUCING: LTC Halloween Ornaments

Halloween is a time when perfectly reasonable people  
choose to reenact some lost pagan rituals. No one seems to  
know why exactly, but Halloween has been celebrated in its  
present form for a little over one hundred years. This new  
set of ornaments dates back to the early 20th century and  
depicts a “classic” Halloween collection of black cats,  
pumpkins, witches and other indispensable Halloween  
ornaments.

Special intro sale price. 50% OFF - only $10 (until  
Halloween 2005) [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/halloween.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20060129052314/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/halloween.html)
author: paul d hunt : 14 October, 2005 - 6:22am
